title: Mujtaba Aziz Naza
text:
Mujtaba Naza (Hindi: मुजतबा नाज़ा, Urdu: مجتبیٰ ناز) is an Indian singer and music composer from Mumbai. He is son of Aziz Naza, He was an Indian playback singer, live performer and music director known for Chadhta Sooraj Dheere Dheere and Jhoom Barabar Jhoom Sharabi. Mujtaba is managed and directed by Akshay KR Singh.


== Discography ==


== Biography ==
He sings Qawaali and composes music. He sung in movies Bajirao Mastani, Sniff, Padmaavat, Haemolymph: Invisible Blood, Indu Sarkar., Bambai Meri Jaan and First Act. Mujtaba Naza is directed and Promoted by Akshay KR Singh
